While in his [[Six Paths Sage Mode]], using the [[Six Paths Senjutsu]] and [[Tailed Beast Mode|fully transformed]] into [[Kurama]], Naruto creates two [[shadow clones]] of the entire chakra construct. The shadow clones merge with the original, creating a three-faced, six-armed construct. In its right arms, it creates a {{translation|Six Paths Big Ball Rasenshuriken|六道大玉螺旋手裏剣|Rikudō Ōdama Rasenshuriken}},<ref>''[[Naruto: Shinobi Collection Shippū Ranbu]]''</ref> and in its left arms, it creates a [[Tailed Beast Ball Rasenshuriken]], both infused with [[natural energy]]. It is strong enough to counter [[Sasuke Uchiha]]'s strongest [[Indra's Arrow|offensive technique]].

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the manga, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]''.
* In ''Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4'', when this technique is used, the explosion creates a vortex similar to a black hole.
